sunscreen.name: UV PLUS Anti-Pollution Sunscreen Multi-Protection Broad Spectrum SPF 50
sunscreen.description: Formulated with Clarins' Anti-Pollution Complex and Broad Spectrum SPF 50 UV Sunscreen—this silky, oil-free day screen helps lock out skin-damaging UVA & UVB rays, pollution and free radicals. Forms an invisible shield that helps protect skin from the appearance of dark spots and the risk of early skin aging.

sunscreen.name: Soothing After Sun Balm
sunscreen.description: Clarins tan-enhancing face and body balm soothes and hydrates skin for 48 hours*—to keep your radiant glow going, long after the sun goes down.

sunscreen.name: SOS Sunburn Soother Mask
sunscreen.description: Clarins icy, cream-gel after sun mask for face and body soothes and rehydrates skin for 48 hours*—leaving it soft, smooth and incredibly comfortable. The perfect post-sun cool down after a day on the sea, beach or slopes.

sunscreen.name: Radiance-Plus Golden Glow Booster for Face
sunscreen.description: Easy-to-apply self tanning drops for the face—formulated with 99% ingredients of natural origin—that delivers an even, long-lasting tan 365 days a year. A concentrated formula that builds in intensity with every drop, so you control the glow—from sun-touched to deep bronze. Just 2-3 tanning drops mixed with any face moisturizer, and you’re golden!

sunscreen.name: Self Tanning Instant Gel
sunscreen.description: A refreshing, quick-drying self tanning gel for face and body that glides on evenly to create an instant, long-lasting, tailor-made tan, any time of the year.

sunscreen.name: Self Tanning Milky Lotion
sunscreen.description: Refreshing sunscreen scrub that gently exfoliates, softens, and nourishes.

sunscreen.name: After Sun Shower Gel
sunscreen.description: Clarins' refreshing, 3-in-1 after sun shower gel for face, body, and hair removes sunscreens, salt, sand, chlorine odors, and pollution—without drying. Perfect after a day at the beach, swimming, or playing sports.

sunscreen.name: Radiance-Plus Golden Glow Booster for Body
sunscreen.description: An easy-to-apply self tanning booster for the body—formulated with 99% ingredients of natural origin—that delivers an even, long-lasting tan 365 days a year. The concentrated formula builds in intensity with every drop, so you control the glow—from sun-touched to deep bronze—for natural-looking, customizable results. Just 4-6 tanning drops mixed with any body moisturizer, and you’re golden!
